verses.verse: Now these are the Mitzvot <WH4687>, the statutes <WH2706>, and the judgments <WH4941>, which the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> to teach <WH3925> <WH8763> you, that ye might do <WH6213> <WH8800> them in the land <WH776> whither ye go <WH5674> <WH8802> to possess <WH3423> <WH8800> it:

That thou mightest fear <WH3372> <WH8799> the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>, to keep <WH8104> <WH8800> all his statutes <WH2708> and his Mitzvot <WH4687>, which I command <WH6680> <WH8764> thee, thou, and thy son <WH1121>, and thy son's <WH1121> son <WH1121>, all the days <WH3117> of thy life <WH2416>; and that thy days <WH3117> may be prolonged <WH748> <WH8686>.

Hear <WH8085> <WH8804> therefore, O Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and observe <WH8104> <WH8804> to do <WH6213> <WH8800> it; that it may be well <WH3190> <WH8799> with thee, and that ye may increase <WH7235> <WH8799> mightily <WH3966>, as the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of thy fathers <WH1> hath promised <WH1696> <WH8765> thee, in the land <WH776> that floweth <WH2100> <WH8802> with milk <WH2461> and honey <WH1706>.
Hear <WH8085> <WH8798>, O Yisra'EL <WH3478>: The YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430> is one <WH259> YY <WH3068>:
And thou shalt love <WH157> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> with all thine heart <WH3824>, and with all thy soul <WH5315>, and with all thy might <WH3966>.
And these words <WH1697>, which I command <WH6680> <WH8764> thee this day <WH3117>, shall be in thine heart <WH3824>:

And thou shalt teach them diligently <WH8150> <WH8765> unto thy children <WH1121>, and shalt talk <WH1696> <WH8765> of them when thou sittest <WH3427> <WH8800> in thine house <WH1004>, and when thou walkest <WH3212> <WH8800> by the way <WH1870>, and when thou liest down <WH7901> <WH8800>, and when thou risest up <WH6965> <WH8800>.
And thou shalt bind <WH7194> <WH8804> them for a sign <WH226> upon thine hand <WH3027>, and they shall be as frontlets <WH2903> between thine eyes <WH5869>.
And thou shalt write <WH3789> <WH8804> them upon the posts <WH4201> of thy house <WH1004>, and on thy gates <WH8179>.

And it shall be, when the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> shall have brought <WH935> <WH8686> thee into the land <WH776> which he sware <WH7650> <WH8738> unto thy fathers <WH1>, to Avraham <WH85>, to Yitz'chak <WH3327>, and to Ya`akov <WH3290>, to give <WH5414> <WH8800> thee great <WH1419> and goodly <WH2896> cities <WH5892>, which thou buildedst <WH1129> <WH8804> not,

And houses <WH1004> full <WH4392> of all good <WH2898> things, which thou filledst <WH4390> <WH8765> not, and wells <WH953> digged <WH2672> <WH8803>, which thou diggedst <WH2672> <WH8804> not, vineyards <WH3754> and olive trees <WH2132>, which thou plantedst <WH5193> <WH8804> not; when thou shalt have eaten <WH398> <WH8804> and be full <WH7646> <WH8804>;

Then beware <WH8104> <WH8734> lest thou forget <WH7911> <WH8799> the YY <WH3068>, which brought thee forth <WH3318> <WH8689> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, from the house <WH1004> of bondage <WH5650>.
Thou shalt fear <WH3372> <WH8799> the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>, and serve <WH5647> <WH8799> him, and shalt swear <WH7650> <WH8735> by his name <WH8034>.
Ye shall not go <WH3212> <WH8799> after <WH310> other <WH312> 'elohim <WH430>, of the 'elohim <WH430> of the people <WH5971> which are round about <WH5439> you;

(For the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> is a jealous <WH7067> 'Elohim <WH410> among <WH7130> you) lest the anger <WH639> of the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> be kindled <WH2734> <WH8799> against thee, and destroy <WH8045> <WH8689> thee from off the face <WH6440> of the earth <WH127>.
Ye shall not tempt <WH5254> <WH8762> the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430>, as ye tempted <WH5254> <WH8765> him in Massah <WH4532>.

Ye shall diligently <WH8104> <WH8800> keep <WH8104> <WH8799> the Mitzvot <WH4687> of the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430>, and his testimonies <WH5713>, and his statutes <WH2706>, which he hath commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> thee.

And thou shalt do <WH6213> <WH8804> that which is right <WH3477> and good <WH2896> in the sight <WH5869> of the YY <WH3068>: that it may be well <WH3190> <WH8799> with thee, and that thou mayest go in <WH935> <WH8804> and possess <WH3423> <WH8804> the good <WH2896> land <WH776> which the YY <WH3068> sware <WH7650> <WH8738> unto thy fathers <WH1>,
To cast out <WH1920> <WH8800> all thine enemies <WH341> <WH8802> from before <WH6440> thee, as the YY <WH3068> hath spoken <WH1696> <WH8765>.

And when thy son <WH1121> asketh <WH7592> <WH8799> thee in time to come <WH4279>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, What mean the testimonies <WH5713>, and the statutes <WH2706>, and the judgments <WH4941>, which the YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430> hath commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> you?

Then thou shalt say <WH559> <WH8804> unto thy son <WH1121>, We were Pharaoh's <WH6547> bondmen <WH5650> in Egypt <WH4714>; and the YY <WH3068> brought us out <WH3318> <WH8686> of Egypt <WH4714> with a mighty <WH2389> hand <WH3027>:

And the YY <WH3068> shewed <WH5414> <WH8799> signs <WH226> and wonders <WH4159>, great <WH1419> and sore <WH7451>, upon Egypt <WH4714>, upon Pharaoh <WH6547>, and upon all his household <WH1004>, before our eyes <WH5869>:
And he brought us out <WH3318> <WH8689> from thence, that he might bring us in <WH935> <WH8687>, to give <WH5414> <WH8800> us the land <WH776> which he sware <WH7650> <WH8738> unto our fathers <WH1>.

And the YY <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> <WH8762> us to do <WH6213> <WH8800> all these statutes <WH2706>, to fear <WH3372> <WH8800> the YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430>, for our good <WH2896> always <WH3117>, that he might preserve us alive <WH2421> <WH8763>, as it is at this day <WH3117>.

And it shall be our righteousness <WH6666>, if we observe <WH8104> <WH8799> to do <WH6213> <WH8800> all these <WH2063> Mitzvot <WH4687> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430>, as he hath commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> us.
